name: My Little Gummy Bear Adventure
description:
Description:

Once upon a time in a candy world where everything is colorful and sweet, there lived gummy bears. Their life was full of joy and sugar. Until now. Candy world has been invaded by gigantic human hand. Heads have started to roll. Unfortunetly for you you've grown attached to your head so escape is your only option. Run little gummy bear, run! And run he did.

Your goal is to reach end of the level and not to get caught by giant hand. Gummy bear will jump towards mouse cursor when you press LMB. The longer you press the button, the higher bear jumps. You can collect other gummy bears, which are scattered throughout the whole level to gain additional lives. When you run out of lifes game ends.

This game features awesome stop-motion animations explaining story and game mechanics, which are played when you reach some of level's checkpoints.

Development Team:

  • Jacek Kozieja (Asterix)
  • Daniel Lewiński (Dante)
  • Wojciech Płatek (Wowo)
  • Krzysztof Taperek (Raptor)

Note:

This game was created during Warsaw Film School Game Jam 2.

Almost every asset and every stop-motion animation included in this game was made out of photos of jellies. We owe big thanks to confectionary industry. Additional thanks to Raptor for lending us a hand.
